%template german_template
- [[现在时变位]]
== 弱变化动词
| 人称      | 词尾                   | 例子               |
|-----------|------------------------|--------------------|
| ich       | stem + <tail>e</tail>  | geh<tail>e</tail>  |
| du        | stem + <tail>st</tail> | geh<tail>st</tail> |
| er/sie/es | stem + <tail>t</tail>  | geh<tail>t</tail>  |
| wir       | "infinitive"           | gehen              |
| ihr       | stem + <tail>t</tail>  | geh<tail>t</tail>  |
| sie/Sie   | "infinitive"           | gehen              |

== 特殊词尾的弱变化动词
- 动词以 "t", "d", "chn", "dn", "fn", "gn" or "tm" 结尾时
| 人称      | 词尾                                       | 例子                                   |
|-----------|--------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------|
| ich       | stem + <tail>e</tail>                      | arbeit<tail>e</tail>                   |
| du        | stem + <slight>e</slight> + <tail>t</tail> | arbeit<slight>e</slight><tail>t</tail> |
| er/sie/es | stem + <slight>e</slight> + <tail>t</tail> | arbeit<slight>e</slight><tail>t</tail> |
| wir       | "infinitive"                               | arbeiten                               |
| ihr       | stem + <slight>e</slight> + <tail>t</tail> | arbeit<slight>e</slight><tail>t</tail> |
| sie/Sie   | "infinitive"                               | arbeiten                               |

- 动词以 "s", "ss", "ß", "x" or "z" 结尾时
| 人称      | 词尾                      | 例子                   |
|-----------|---------------------------|------------------------|
| ich       | stem + <tail>e</tail>     | tanz<tail>e</tail>     |
| du        | stem + <slight>t</slight> | tanz<slight>t</slight> |
| er/sie/es | stem + <tail>t</tail>     | tanz<tail>t</tail>     |
| wir       | "infinitive"              | tanzen                 |
| ihr       | stem + <slight>t</slight> | tanz<slight>t</slight> |
| sie/Sie   | "infinitive"              | tanzen                 |

- 动词以 "eln"  结尾时,人称“我”去掉 "l" 前 "e"
| 人称      | 词尾                                       | 例子                  |
|-----------|--------------------------------------------|-----------------------|
| ich       | stem - <slight>e</slight> + <tail>e</tail> | lächle<tail>e</tail>  |
| du        | stem + <tail>st</tail>                     | lächel<tail>st</tail> |
| er/sie/es | stem + <tail>t</tail>                      | lächel<tail>t</tail>  |
| wir       | "infinitive"                               | lächeln               |
| ihr       | stem + <tail>t</tail>                      | lächel<tail>t</tail>  |
| sie/Sie   | "infinitive"                               | lächeln               |

== 强变化动词
- 动词词干中有 "a" or "e" 时，二三人称单数需换音/变音为 "ä" or "ie/i"
| 人称      | 例子 a->ä                 | 例子 e->ie              | 例子 e->i              |
|-----------|---------------------------|-------------------------|------------------------|
| ich       | schl<slight>a</slight>fe  | s<slight>e</slight>he   | g<slight>e</slight>be  |
| du        | schl<slight>ä</slight>fst | s<slight>ie</slight>hst | g<slight>i</slight>bst |
| er/sie/es | schl<slight>ä</slight>ft  | s<slight>ie</slight>ht  | g<slight>i</slight>bt  |
| wir       | "infinitive"              | "infinitive"            | "infinitive"           |
| ihr       | schl<slight>a</slight>ft  | s<slight>e</slight>ht   | g<slight>e</slight>bt  |
| sie       | "infinitive"              | "infinitive"            | "infinitive"           |
